height: 20px;\" /><span class=\"screen-reader-only\" style=\"background-color:#FA839F;\">Screen reader version of make sure the parts work together, opens in a new tab</span></a><br />&nbsp;</p><table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-summary\" style=\"width:100%;\"><thead><tr><th scope=\"col\">Remember!</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><p>A great paragraph includes the following:</p><ul><li>a topic sentence, with a topic and a main idea</li><li>support that proves, explains, or shows what you are saying</li><li>sentences that all relate to the topic sentence</li><li>transition words that make your writing clear</li><li>a concluding sentence that restates the main idea</li></ul></td></tr></tbody></table><p>&nbsp;</p>","rightText":null,"headerText":"Putting it all together"},{"settings":{"showAudio":1,"showNext":1,"showHeader":0,"hideRightPanel":0,"delayStep":0,"delayRight":0,"showRuler":0,"showRFB":1},"leftText":"<p>Your neighbor&#39;s paragraph is now much stronger and should attract readers to the fair!<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<table border=\"2\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p><strong>The Downtown Street Fair: Come one, come all</strong></p><p>Those who attend the Downtown Street Fair will be treated to a wide variety of attractions, from Chinese acrobats to&nbsp;international food and music.&nbsp; First, <span>t</span>he Chinese acrobats are incredible athletes who have been in training since they were five years old.&nbsp; The Malaysian snake charmer will seem to hypnotize a cobra before your very eyes.&nbsp; In addition, vendors will be selling everything from French croissants to Greek souvlaki.&nbsp; Finally, mirroring the international aspect of the food, the Downtown Street fair will also feature music from many cultures, from New Orleans jazz to Caribbean calypso.
